text: I started programming as a hobby in 2018, and have since developed it into a professional career. I've been working as a full-time software developer for nearly 2 years, focusing on building and maintaining enterprise applications.

I specialize in creating full-stack applications with a focus on scalability, security, and performance. My expertise lies in back-end development using Node.js or C#, where I work on developing and maintaining systems that handle high-traffic loads while ensuring code quality and maintainability.
I also enjoy working on personal projects and exploring new technologies, particularly in areas like web development and desktop applications using frameworks such as React and Electron.
